Title: Moves certain elections to odd-numbered years; repealer
Summary: Moves certain elections to odd-numbered years.
LawCode: Amd §80, Town L; amd §17-1703-a, Vil L; amd §34, Munic Home R L; rpld §400 sub 8, County L; rpld §5, Chap 741 of 2023
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, the village law, and the municipal home rule law, in relation to moving certain elections to odd-numbered years; and to repeal certain provisions of the county law and chapter 741 of the laws of 2023 amending the town law, the village law, the county law, and the municipal home rule law, in relation to moving certain elections to even-numbered years, in relation thereto
